thread.title: Germany's Merkel says China and Germany standing by Iran nuclear deal

title: Germany's Merkel says China and Germany standing by Iran nuclear deal
text:
May 24, 2018 / 4:29 AM / Updated 18 minutes ago Germany's Merkel says China and Germany standing by Iran nuclear deal Reuters Staff 1 Min Read
BEIJING (Reuters) - German Chancellor Angela Merkel said on Thursday China and Germany are standing by the existing nuclear deal with Iran after the United States left the 2015 accord earlier this month. German Chancellor Angela Merkel and Chinese Premier Li Keqiang review the guard of honour during a welcome ceremony outside the Great Hall of the People in Beijing, China May 24, 2018. REUTERS/Jason Lee
Merkel made the comment during a joint news briefing with Chinese Premier Li Keqiang at Beijingâ€™s Great Hall of the People during a two-day visit to China. Reporting by Ben Blanchard, Thomas Peter and Tom Daly; Writing by Beijing Monitoring Desk; Editing by Paul Tait
